name: titre
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
medical
  specialized a measurement of the concentration of a substance (= how much of it there is) in an amount of blood: antibody titre It is important that vets have rabies antibody titres checked every two years. If a pregnant patient’s rubella titre is less than 1:8, she should be immunized after delivering the baby. high titre A protective effect was observed among infants born to mothers with high titres.low titre This test could not detect pigs with low titres of antibody.
chemistry
  specialized a measurement of the concentration of a substance (= how much of it there is) in an amount of liquid: In this unit you will be taught how to calculate the titre of a solution. In this video I explain how to calculate the mean titre from a set of titration results.
More examplesFewer examplesA much higher antibody titre in the second sample indicated an acute infection.If inflammatory bowel disease is suspected, consider stool cultures, viral titres, serologies, and/or biopsy. If, after titration, you have more than one titre value you will have to decide which value to use.A high titre vaccine is a modified live vaccine that contains a higher number of virus particles than the "average" vaccine.
